articles.title: House Republicans grinding through marathon hearings to push ahead with Trump’s big bill - AP News
articles.description: Tax breaks tallying more than $5 trillion. But also sizable reductions in Medicaid health care, food stamps for older Americans and green energy strategies to fight climate change. Those all faced sharp debate as House lawmakers pushed through marathon public…

articles.author: Dan Gentile
articles.title: Two-time Academy Award winner blasts 'America's philistine president' at Cannes - SFGATE
articles.description: Accepting a lifetime achievement award at Cannes, Robert De Niro used his speech to denounce President Donald Trump's defunding of the arts.
articles.content: US actor Robert De Niro receives the Honorary Palme d'Or from US actor Leonardo Dicaprio during the Opening Ceremony of the 78th edition of the Cannes Film Festival in Cannes, southern France, on May… [+2956 chars]
